twitch_info.title: stream doesn't end until the credits roll

message.body: you're a little quiet, sounds like youre far away from the mic or sth
some of the original stages are p hard tbh i get that
oh brother, makers are completely blind to their own difficulty fr
heyo, surprised to see you streamin
it was rly hard to nerf it too, its crazy
do u want a hint for this boss or nah cuz the mechanics are kinda inscrutable
yeah this boss took me half an hour to figure out the first time lol, then another 20 mins to beat
the pause buffer strats are still insane honestly
never thought i'd see the day
you can see it in the background
to be fair this stage predates ch3&4
yeah it's funny how the washing machine attack is the only actually scary one LOL
the sound effect is kinda inspired too, its half of why i call it the washing machine
oh what the fuck i never knew you could skip it
dude u keep tryna worm into the tiny spaces lmao
go into the bigger spaces bcuz the yellow lasers dont hurt you
I thought I was bein clever but no LOL
yeah this stage has that effect on ppl
interesting perspective, especially since you managed to lose by killing each individually first lol
it's honestly a really cool concept, personally i don't really like playing it but i can see the ambition
oh ye rabbit & steel i know that
personally i would make it a lot faster but yeah it's a pretty cool concept
i should say btw, on the og version the judges played eggman could go allll the way to the top of the screen in 2nd phase
and hitting him would be hell
you had to aim it very weirdly
i believe we ran that thru harley before doing it too
we both ported the stages lol idr who ported yours
but we're like fixing stuff in everything anyway
i remember seeing ur code ur like the one single person i know who uses the self keyword
gamemaker syntax is wild you can get away with so much shit
Hahaha thank you, it def needed to be nerfed
i believe the only change was making eggman not go all the way to the top
I've played a single fangame before this nor have I made anything before this
also it's rabbit & steel not rabbit & spell........
Idk if I've heard of that
I'm glad! I put so much time and effort into this
yeah it's an awesome stage, i personally am not a huge fan of playing the boss but it's really really cool
has that fanfiction/sprite comic vibe and i love that, you don't get that much these days
dude yeah sprite comics will always live on in my mind
Oh I had no idea that sound was used elsewhere
havent heard of that site before sadly
But yeah back to your convo earlier, I'm a software engineer who writes in typescript so GML looking kinda like JS/TS but not was really annoying
oh that was a GM dev? damn that's kinda sad
i thought it was some rando
I haven't used studio 2 no, I had to learn gamemaker for this competition
No it's the same room LOL
the swapping mechanic is absolutely wild
Every level each world was overlayed on top of itself, it was a nightmare to make
So the sonic and yoshis island level tiles were just on top of each other
Making the levels was just sprite vomit
I def probably coulda done it better
I just ran out of time to make more levels
it's kinda wild you managed to do it at all honestly, i remember the first time i saw the rooms in the editor i thought it was totally broken
Most of my time was spent making the music, the engine to swap the music, the mechanics to swap the tiles/worlds
it was only later that i realized how you did thingsLOL
oh harley's stage is #1 wildest thing in the game
she literally was working till 4am the night before and then worked from waking up till 2 minutes before the deadline lol
it broke a whole lot during development LOL, but it's good
I was so stressed out from the time crunch I started getting sick from the stress
I set my sights way too high
i did pull some 16 hour days toward the end of the deadline for this so i kinda get whatchu feel
And now I'm forced to watch non devs make AI code reviews that aren't production ready changes and I just have to endure
Corpo software dev is so cooked, I just wanna get out at this point
Package version mismatches causing broken stuff is the worst
Yeah, I've had some crazy ass development environments when I worked at Amazon
They do shit in the most convoluted ways
Well from my experience they just fire entire dev teams and expect you to just find a new job on a different team
Idek what sound effect you're talking about hahaha
No you're fired from the company
But like all of dev team X is just fired

My project they spent like millions and at the end of it they just shit it down and fired everyone LOL, I asked one of the devs how he landed here and he said he got fired 4 other times from different teams
Like my guy why are you still working here
LOL I spent so long making the dialogue and cutscene
Nal was like "you had the audacity to make 2 dialogue boxes!?"
Yeah, maybe I shoulda just had it hit the cage, but then the fish would just not be a threat to you, but maybe that's okay
It was also kinda supposed to hint towards the phase 2 of guiding it
tbh i think just a dialogue box of like eggman taunting you if he misses or whatever would fix it
@squaredork This woulda been smart for sure
I'll have to keep that in mind if I ever make more stuff
honestly whenever you make a boss you should just consult nal about it, he's goated
Yeah, he was just helping wonderful and I didn't super know him at the time so I didn't wanna bother him
ive never heard of retro 2 LOL
@squaredork literally what I do every time xd
it is a word yeah lol
it's a very marc word to use tbh
I had to remake all the songs in both themes harley407YesHoney
yeah NO ONE has custom music in this community
oh yeah sound design is also quite lacking in the community too lol
sound effects on their own do SO much for a game. all those little details you just said really add up too

Yeah making the music stay in sync was such a pain, and then I had to keep track of the drowning music on each world too, I wanted to do a double underwater stage so you swap back and forth to the sonic drowning music over and over
i think that was just cuz the drums were too quiet on 1st phase
they were there but barely audible
Nah, I think it was just a miss
I used the yoshis island sound font which was awkward LOL
Marc is just here to roast me harley407YesHoney
Marc is roasting the whole competition
yeah marc is by far the most strict judge lol
fucking 3 in creativity for this stage is WILD
@squaredork I am curious what his criteria for it was, but I'm not about to argue with people and their opinions
Got this new indie underground animation called Jujutsu Kaizen
One thing thing I don't understand is saying my personality and personal touch feels small in implementation
I'm just genuinely not sure what he's saying
it's funny how like even in the backwater fuckin brazilian town i live in, people still know jujutsu kaisen
@HarleyHardt he has a lot of moments like that tbh
or well his reviews i mean
My biggest regret was using a sonic spritesheet
Shit was abysmal to work with
nah ive heard that complaint from a few others starz
i'd have to change a loot to fix that though, it's hardcoded for jump=confirm and i made a lot of the UI in a haze lmao
@HarleyHardt ur lucky you havent had to deal with spritesheets for mobile games tbh
those sideways and upside down duplicate frames will haunt me
Hahaha oh god yeah, I avoid mobile like the plague
yeah i feel that starz LOL, i also hardcoded all the positions for everything in the UI
and like only a month in did i realize how awful that was
The fact that I got a 9/10 and a single category from a single judge makes me super happy hahaha
there's an extension for gm82 called gm82ui that simplifies things a lot
but that didnt exist while i made the ui for this so lmao
I had a ton of ideas around the gimmick that just never made it into levels
My take way from a lot of these comments is I had a decent idea but just genuinely ran out of time haha
oh yeah LOL it is cpu-bound
it being cpu bound is just a gm8 thing afaik
honestly i'm p sure renex would appreciate the contribution a lot though
a lot of ppl just entirely overlook 8.2 in the community
@Lndegen Shouldn't you be making that game you were gonna release this year? Times ticking nickwh2MadgeWooly
Imagine wonderful actually working on games
It was supposed to be the world's colliding LOL
i remember the first time i saw the rainbow player
Like showing the worlds be merged or whatever
i thought the stage was gonna be like bottom 10 til i saw the rainbow player and i was like "oh this'll be good"
cuz i knew it was a shader/surface
yeah i havent seen anyone in general say they rly enjoyed the boss LOL
I personally liked how epic the boss felt, but I def understand that the gameplay fell short a bit
there's like 5 "hardest stages you've ever played" in this game tbh
it's very much the hardest contest game made thus far LOL
it was insane how hard some people made their stages
Yeah Im not even gonna download the game cause I won't be able to best anything
yeah it's so you can switcch between like
oh yeah beach is FUCKED lmao
so is this gonna be like a 24 hour stream if you’re not ending till credits?
hahaha yeah sorry we're hella derailing you
beach being fucked wasnt intentional btw but it's funny how most of the hard stage ended up there lol
LOL "this is just a one-off" holy
i'm glad i jumpscared hydro at FGA and introduced him to dldc
oh god yeah pyro stage is sooo rough lmao
Haha it makes me super happy it wasn't just universally hated
there's also a yoshi egg there
the problem is sonic tilesets have some small level of implied 3d
honestly the fact all the fucked up stages placed roughly similar makes it hard to balance it that way
also yeah astral prominence was pyro's first fangame work
they went in like "i don't really need playtesters surely i can do something reasonable"
i will say the minimum score is 1 but yeah
Wonderful and I missed that stage, run it back for the fans? samusHOLD
i will say if you can beat all the beach stages you can handle the others
i can send the msg if you want
i will say this is the guy who like
solved all the cn2.5 secrets and was 2nd to clear it too
idk if its the same guy
i was surprised at his placement too but honestly i think it makes sense
LOL yeah that's how i feel too
im excited to see when ppl get to my stage
most ppl r doing the 'intended' order
uhhh i genuinely don't know lmao
i dont think its that different
i dont recall that being a talking point at least
if only because there's some kinda fucked secrets
oh wait you mean the wall things
yeah the up/down fields are from cn3
i don't think anyone's made swapping the up/down fields before this stage
at least i havent seen it
yeah i havent seen those either
dude ur tunnel visioning so hard
you need some rest bro LOL
i forgot that was the last room tbh
yee, for me i like the more action-y mechanics but puzzle-y stuff is cool too
i'm always on the lookout for new mechanics either way though
you never know where ur gonna get ur next big inspo
i havent heard of jumper in years lmao
honestly it's not a super creative stage but it's a neat lil one
dude we tried so hard to make this not nanc 3 lmao
i would recommend you try out the deathless mode after clearing it btw, it may seem like impossible but it's actually very reasonable
there's a fair few stages where you kinda cant do that
i will say btw astral prominence is also one room
that was not a rule lmao
ok thats what u mean yeah
i'm the one single person who does it
yeah it's funny it was a rule because like
really i am the one single person who's playing with the resolution in the community
honestly im kinda glad to hear ur like this too cuz like
i think you've kinda become one of those urban legend members that never says anything lmao
i'd say the same too, like if it weren't for DLDC my main project would be finished
but it would also be way worse lmao
i'm usually bottlenecked by level design in my games bcuz i'm kinda ass at it lol
or at least ass at making a lot fo it
honestly yeah i agree for like gm8.1 and gms1
idk about gms2 since i havent used it much
but i am a fan of the 8.2 editor
i kinda feel that too lmao
i felt that especially with game_change()
i feel like half of the market for gm is h-games lmao
i mean honestly there's a bunch that are gm
more of those that are made in gm than regular games lol
i mean obv its prolly not close to half
but it's a lot more than you'd think
honestly yeah, i think despite the shortcomings of 8.1 it's probably the future for ppl like us
yeah i'm definitely tied to gm too
i've tried godot and unity before and like bounced off them pretty hard
gm is the only one that stuck with me
i also tried like fucking stencyl way back lmao
godot def feels designed like "if you don't like unity you can come here"
i think the real issue with 8.2 is that floogle/ren are pretty limited in what they can do without the source code
yeah i get what you mean
there's some things ren keeps that are very much because like
he's used every gm version ever and is nostalgic for them
it kinda needs to be niche
i mean the issue with that is mostly that like
ren has said he can't really improve upon the basic design of gm8.1 lol
and i kinda gotta agree i think the fundamentals of gm are very good
i will say i think there's a lot more that  can be done with the 8.1 codebase
part of it is also that they want to remain compatible with 8.1
yeah that got me when i first played LOL
i know whatchu mean it's such a good moment in ur stage
i really thought it was over and then i was like ohhhh when i had that moment
the title drop makes it seem so final too
that's water3 you can jump from it
you don't gotta like back away
no i said to NOT back away lmao
im kinda glad you didnt do the deathless thing it wouldnt've fit for ur stage
ur the first person to die there LMAO
we had one outside tester for this game because its so fucking huge
inhuman ability to stumble into every bug ever
yeah he's been workin on happil 2
you should see a video of boss 4
you prolly only saw phase 2 lol
had to go through the big filter
ok in that case yeah you've seen phase 3
no wait the chase was phase 4
yeah you've seen the whole boss
i left the happil server a while back tbh
just is the real urban legend
alright now i gotta go LMAO it's fucking 5 am here i need to sleep
i think the placement is a little funny
it's funny how i have to mention it it's very non-obvious
it would def not be a regular thing lmao
LOL yeah this one's kinda hard
not as hard as anything in beach but still hard
its the perfect amount of hard for this game
ur stage is the perfect amount of hard
i agree with u a lot
honestly yea im surprised ur based lol
i kinda had a weird view of u before
although there's some real assholes in this community so
the diss track drop would be insane
the issue is the ppl i dont like are huge members of the community
i feel like we're thinking of the same person
we can talk in dms if you wanna lmao
yeah same, i only hate a few ppl bcuz like, they went after my friends
ok actually i'll ask in dms
to me it's like, i either don't hate someone at all or i really hate them
cuz what makes me hate ppl is pretty huge stuff
these not killing you IS a bug LMAO
yea i'll make an exception for you specifically
dude EVERYONE thinks theres a gap
honestly it might be easier to do it the intended way
the timer for them is like
around the time of a fulljump
cuz the sonic AI is just like trhese cherries lol
id recommend activating all of them before focusing on the refreshers
hi. what the name of the game?
oh yeah dude rpg systems in gm are always so jank
Wake up unc, I'm old school streamer now, that's how advanced we are now
the only OGs are those who were part of denferok's twitch team
had to earn your place among the wannabes
Looks like you gotta make it breaking out
wannabes is part of the old testament
I remember when moses dodged that chariot trap in the red sea that was insane
barfy's literally the Atlas of the category
Maybe take a peak some nights and u may be surprised what u c....
i cant believe valve KILLED delfruit
the klazen splatoon streams were the true catalyst
alright i do not have the time for another stage LOL i'm goin to sleep
it must be an irrelevant meme, since i don't remember it
